scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n WEB,ANALYZER -c auto "cd web && node server.js" "cd analyzer && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n WEB,ANALYZER -c auto "cd web && node server.js" "cd analyzer && PORT=${ANALYZER_PORT:-5001} node server.js"
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix analyzer && npm install --prefix web
